\(D\). The \(N - N\) single bond is stronger than the \(P-P\) single bond.

\(C\). \(NO _{2} B _{2} O _{3}, PbO , SnO _{2}\)

\(D\). \(ZnO , Al _{2} O _{3}, PbO _{,} PbO _{2}\)

\(A\). \(Al \left( CH _{3}\right)_{3}\) has the three-centre two-electron bonds in its dimeric structure.

\(C\). \(AlCl _{3}\) has three-centre two-electron bonds in its dimeric structure.

\(D\). \(BH _{3}\) has three-centre two-electron bonds in its dimeric structure.
